title: Trump says Hamas is ready for peace and Israel ‘must immediately stop bombing of Gaza’ – live
summary: Donald Trump expressed approval of Hamas's response to his Gaza plan, indicating a positive reception. However, Hamas has stated that further negotiations are necessary to work out specific details. The exchange highlights ongoing complexities in addressing the Gaza situation.
